listitem.para: Outputs a list of the names of every font typeface that is supported by the operating system. The order of this list is not defined.
Each typeface name is given as a list and can be used as input to SETLABELFONT.

listitem.programlisting: SHOW FONTFACENAMES [[System] [Courier New] [Times New Roman] [Arial] [Verdana] [Webdings] [Microsoft Sans Serif]]
